divs: Sighting Detailsi spotted it off to the horizon as a bright white light. it was south heading north. it was flashing multiple red lights, i believe a blue light, and as it passed midway another white light came on. it was large and triangular. was not exactly a triangle. it was silent as a mouse. the object was in the flight path of gerald r ford air port but the airport real time flight schedual does not have any craft scheduled until 8 am. it was low to the ground maybe a mile up. i have seen more UFO activity at this residence than i have ever seen anywhere else that i have lived.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Middleville
There were no other sightings in Middleville on or around April 2nd 2010
